text:
Hi all, i have a big issue if someone can help me that will be great!
When i make changes in a template file, and click publish, the changes are not appearing on the site. i have tried multiple times without any success
any idea on what to do ?
hello, do you get any errors in your template?
:thinking_face: maybe it's a caching issue then? have you tried to check the page from incognito?

when i edit a section after a page reload everything is fine, i can see the controls on the left side (screenshot one), However, once something gets automatically saved, those controls disappear (screenshot 2) . I only see the section icons when i do a page reload.
strange thing mate i have no idea whats goin on still cant find the issue, it works on the sandbox but i cant change anything on live
Did you try clicking out of any module/section? Typically these section controls disappear when you are editing them. Then you need to click “home” above the content tab for them to show up again.
Are the changes on the template on modules that already existed and have been overwritten on the page? If so the template changes will not overwrite what already exists on the live page.
Im making changes to the module that is implemented on that page
What you can try to do is cloning the module and then deleting the old module to see if your changes come through.
Is there any documentation on the `advanced_visibility`  field?
I actually wanted to show list of items on action and that list is different for different user which is dynamic,
Cool, in that case the `widgetSize` field in example 3 (which uses an `optionsUrl`) should be what you’re looking for
Is there anyway to change your *username* on the *HubSpot community forums*? :thinking_face:
